features: [Capture Every Moment Easily with Variety of Devices] The universal phone holder for tripod and standard 1/4 screw made this tripod a multifunctional tripod, which can be used as selfie stick tripod for iPhone, Phone tripod for Android, tripod for camera and more. Let this tripod around with you from home to everywhere,from novice to professional.It’s Perfect for selfies, group photos, adventure travel, vlogging, YouTube videos, podcasts, Facebook Live, FaceTime, Instagram, live streaming.

[Heavy Duty & Lightweight Tripod] Diversing from other selfie stick tripods, VISCEED cell phone tripod's base is made of 100% iron material and firmly stands on the floor even under strong wind. Just detached from the base, the aluminum alloy selfie stick is lightweight and very easy to hold. The whole tripod only weighs 0.88kg.

[Upgraded Phone Tripod with Remote] With updated sensor chip, the Wireless clicker can connect to your phone in 1 second, no traditional disconnecting problem. Take satisfying photos and videos within 33ft/10m is piece of cake with this smartphone tripod. This tripod for iphone, Android phones like Google Pixel, LG, Samsung, Galaxy also fits for DSLR, small cameras.

[Tall Tripod with Free Angle] Retracted to 18 inch/45.7 cm and extended to 67 inch/170 cm, this tall portable tripod can meet your various indoor or outdoor photography needs. Easily take horizontal, vertical, inclined or overhead view photos/videos owing to the 360° rotating tripod ball head, capturing all expected or suprising angles, recording your wonderful moments.

[World Class After-sale Service] VICSEED provides worry-free 18 months replacement service and lifetime friendly after-sales service. If your phone tripod has any quality issues, please contact our customer service. We will fix the problem within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The most convenient way of taking picture by easy click on the button Install the battery to the remote ( 2 batteries included )Press the button until the signal turn redPair your phone with "Z07-5" Done, click to take picture remotely
The higher you stand, the more you capture Easy to flip up to whichever height you want it at to quickly set up for the perfect angle.
Detachable to be a long selfie stick

Don't t need to ask your friend: Can you take more photos from other angle？ Multi-angle ball head makes it can be set up to use at tons of different angles. Becomes your own photographer who would not out of patience. It just work until you are satisfied with the perfect shot from the best angle. without any complaint.

Comes with a carry bag It folds up so small and quick. Very easy to bring anywhere Compact enough to fit in a backpack when going out The strongest grip in a phone holder with soft silicone pad Protect your valuable phone from fall and scratch. Don't need to remove phone case to fit in the holder. It is wide enough to hold all different size of phone, even with thick case. New level of compatiblity It can not only use for ALL smart phone and DSLR camera, but also work for projector that with 1/4 nut.

Why VICSEED 67" tripod Hands-free Don't need to hold your phone to take picture with blur anymore.Tripod with remote does the trick. Durable High-end aviation lightweight alloy is built to last long and we stand behind each product for 18 months! Easy to use Every part of the tripod is easy to use with just a twist to lock or release. More Shooting Angles Great range in height adjustments from 17" to 67" that will fit any situation. As you know, short tripod limits shooting angle. 24 hours on-call We provide 18 months of replacement without any charge. Welcome to let us know if there is any problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional, lightweight, versatile and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love this tripod! It arrived promptly and I put it together in about 5 minutes. It is so easy to expand and contract. I love the fact that it is lightweight so I can take it with me on hikes (about 1.6lbs). It can be used as both a tripod or a selfie stick.A phone or small camera can be in a vertical or horizontal position as you can see in the photos. It can be set as very tall or very short. It comes with a remote that you will need to pair through BlueTooth with your phone.I really like that you can move the phone in any various directions and angles to position it they way you want. I am excited to be able to take photos now with the back camera on my phone (in addition to the front). As you know the back camera is a much better camera.Also the phone mount expands and contracts according to the phone size so when/if I upgrade to a different phone, I don't have to worry about its size. This tripod will work with it as well. It seems sturdy even though it is lightweight. It can hold a small camera, I put one I have on it and it had no problems but mine is not blue tooth enabled so I did not try the remote with it. I did use the remote with my iphone I7+ and it connected readily.When finished it can be compacted and stored in my backpack. I would likely hook the remote to my key chain so I won't loose it. It has a small hook.I am looking forward to taking this tripod with me on my next hiking adventure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From packaging to product quality and performance...EXCELLENT!
reviews.reviewText: PACKAGING was beyond expectations, and it comes with a carrying bag.QUALITY is amazing, it's lightweight and assembles with perfection; there is no shortage of clamps and adjustable parts that work with precision.PERFORMANCE is fantastic. The tripod feet are adjustable along with three lengths of extension rod; the phone holder is secure and has many adjustments besides being quick to set up. Even the remote is of good quality (compared to others I have purchased), and they even include an additional CR2032 battery besides the one that is already installed in the remote.PRICE - worth ever penny! I'm going to buy more for adult Christmas gifts because I'm THAT impressed.Get yours before they're sold out.Disclaimer: I have not been solicited nor have I received merch from this seller; and I rarely leave reviews but felt SO happy with the tripod that I had to share my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Service was amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I like this product. It is light and sturdy and flexible and functional. I lost the remote control on a trip and I contacted customer support and they promptly acted on a replacement -- not just the remote but the whole product. They handled everything efficiently with a shout out to Helen for making things happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The tripod portion is sturdier than others, but the mount portion is forgettable
reviews.reviewText: The tripod portion is sturdier than others of similar build. I tried 5 other similar tripods. This tripod stopped shaking the fastest after receiving a slight bump. Regardless, all tripods of this style (short legs, long neck) are fighting against physics because it is an inherently unstable design. You sacrifice stability and gain portability, but it is stable enough for light duty work on level ground away from wind. This style of tripod is for cell phones and/or light accessories. If you need more stability at a height of 5 feet, then you should go with a tripod with longer legs for the wider base, but you will have less portability. But if the tripod is too clunky, you are not going to travel with it. The best tripod is the one you have with you.Regarding the ball joint and spring-loaded holder, I quickly replaced that portion with other devices I have. If you look at the reviews, the ball joint and holder are the source of almost all complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting much from a tripod at this price, but I'm extremely impressed with it. The design is fantastic and it's very easy to configure. Out of the box, it took me less than a minute to set up.It's very lightweight but incredibly sturdy. It extends to over 6 feet tall but can also fit into its keyboard sized bag. I'm really amazed by this tripod. You can use it as a selfie stick if you want, and it's very very easy to take off the tripod. It comes with a controller that's easy to set up with your phone, and they even included an extra battery.My favorite part about this tripod is that it actually holds my brick of a phone. Pictured is the samsung s20 in a love mei case. The case is extremely thick and heavy, but the phone holder has no problem clamping it. It's a very strong phone holder, and it's the main reason I bought this vicseed product (I bought their phone mount for my car and it's also great). This product comes with a 12 month warranty, but once you register it online you get an extra 18 month warranty (30 month warranty total). I'm very impressed by this tripod and it's construction/functionality. Would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Tripod,amazingly light, and works well for specific occasions
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent tripod for the price. It’s very easy to set up and fold back. The height can smoothly adjusted as needed. I'm using it for camera videos and phone photos. Two heads for camera and phone are very easy to switch as needed. The knob is very sensitive to connect and excellent to control without delay. It came with two batteries for knob, so I don’t need to worry about if I use it outside photo shooting.I tried use the tripod on different floor situations, it always be very stable as it comes the additional support at the bottom. And also, the top head can adjust camera or phone’s angle. My experience so far is this is a tremendous value for most users with very-good equipment. I'm very happy with these tripods so far. I also love the fact that it comes with its own bag. Great value for the price. Definitely would recommend this to my friends!!!
